sourcesContent: import {Component} from '@angular/core'; import {CompaniesService} from "../../services/companies.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-createcompany', templateUrl: './createcompany.component.html', styleUrls: ['./createcompany.component.css'] }) export class CreatecompanyComponent { company = { name: "", city: "", address: "", description: "", } constructor(private companyService: CompaniesService) { } createCompany() { this.companyService.createCompany(this.company).subscribe((response: any) => { console.log(response); }) } }
